des: ELDER AFFIRMATIONS SAMPLER I Am Older & Happier Because... By... AUDIENCE Elder Facilities & Elders Families & Elders... INSTRUCTIONS FACILITIES Make this a Fun Facility Activity. Gather the Elders Together. Care Giver asks Alexa for a Couple of Affirmations for the Group to Listen To and Discuss Amongst the Group. Play with Them. Have Fun with Them. Listen to The Elders propose Changes in their Behaviors. Then after a week Gather the Elders together again and See How They Feel. Maybe make this a Weekly Facility Activity... INSTRUCTIONS FAMILIES Make this a Fun Family Activity. Gather the Family Together. Family Member asks Alexa for a Couple of Affirmations for the Family to Listen To and Discuss Amongst the Family. Play with Them. Have Fun with Them. Listen to The Elder propose a Change in Behavior. Then after a week Gather the Family together again and See How The Elder Feels. Maybe make this a Weekly Family Activity.... INSTRUCTIONS ELDERS Make this a Fun Activity. Listen to a Couple of Affirmations. Reflect on Them. Play with Then in Your Mind at Least a Dozen Times. Have Fun with Them. Change a Behavior. Then after a week See How You Feel. Maybe make this a Weekly Activity... PRODUCED by Elder Radio & Television Network... POWERED by Elder Happiness Association... THANK YOU Partners for Radio TV & OnLine Content... THANK YOU Audience for Joining In The Wonderful World of Elder Happiness... THANK YOU Everyone for Creating More Elder Happiness & Less Elder Loneliness... SIGNON Welcome to Elder Affirmations Sampler. Let’s Start... SIGNOFF Random Salutations...
